page.title: 17Employment
page.content: The main employers in the area are still largely the traditional ones although industry generally is in a decline and unemployment features largely amongst the parents of children of Barrow Hill School. A survey carried out by the children showed that parents did not commute long distances.The Stanton and Staveley Steel Works has a much reduced work force.The N.C.B. employs men at Renishaw Park and in open cast workings.Barrow Hill brickworks employs locally.There is a small industrial estate at Staveley.Female employment tends to be in shops,offices and supermarkets and there is a small clothing manufacturer.Many of the mothers are employed as cleaners.Vinatex Chemicals employ a considerable work force.
